short.ar: هزيمة خصمك قبل نفاد الوقت في لعبة كرة القدم كرة الرأس عن طريق اختيار شخصيتك.
short.am: በራስ ኳስ የእግር ኳስ ጨዋታ ላይ ጊዜው ከማለፉ በፊት የእርስዎን ገጸ-ባህሪ በመምረጥ የእርስዎን ባላጋራ ማሸነፍ.
short.bg: Победете опонента си, преди да изтече времето в главата топка футболна игра, като изберете вашия характер.
short.bn: আপনার চরিত্রটি বেছে নিয়ে হেড বল ফুটবল গেমটিতে সময় শেষ হওয়ার আগে আপনার প্রতিপক্ষকে পরাজিত করুন।
short.ca: Derrota el teu oponent abans que s'acabi el temps en el joc de futbol de pilota de cap triant el teu personatge.
short.cs: Porazte svého soupeře dříve, než vyprší čas ve fotbalové hře s míčem na hlavě, výběrem své postavy.
short.da: Besejr din modstander, før tiden løber ud i hovedboldfodboldspillet ved at vælge din karakter.
short.de: Besiege deinen Gegner, bevor die Zeit im Kopfballfußballspiel abläuft, indem du deinen Charakter wählst.
short.el: Νικήστε τον αντίπαλό σας πριν τελειώσει ο χρόνος στο παιχνίδι ποδοσφαίρου με μπάλα στο κεφάλι επιλέγοντας τον χαρακτήρα σας.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Defeat your opponent before the time runs out in the head ball soccer game by choosing your character.
short.es: Derrota a tu oponente antes de que se acabe el tiempo en el juego de fútbol de pelota de cabeza eligiendo a tu personaje.
short.et: Võita vastane enne, kui peapalli jalgpallimängus aeg otsa saab, valides oma tegelase.
short.fa: شکست حریف خود را قبل از زمان اجرا می شود در سر توپ فوتبال بازی با انتخاب شخصیت خود را.
short.fi: Voita vastustajasi ennen kuin aika loppuu pääpallojalkapallon jalkapallopelissä valitsemalla hahmosi.
short.fil: Talunin ang iyong kalaban bago ang oras na naubusan sa laro ng bola sa ulo ng soccer laro sa pamamag
short.fr: Battez votre adversaire avant que le temps ne s’écoule dans le jeu de football head ball en choisissant votre personnage.
short.gu: તમારા પાત્રની પસંદગી કરીને હેડ બોલ સોકર રમતમાં સમય સમાપ્ત થાય તે પહેલાં તમારા વિરોધીને હરાવો.
short.he: הבס את היריב שלך לפני שנגמר הזמן במשחק כדורגל כדור הראש על ידי בחירת הדמות שלך.
short.hi: अपने चरित्र को चुनकर सिर की गेंद फुटबॉल खेल में समय बाहर चलाता है इससे पहले कि अपने प्रतिद्वंद्वी को हराने।
short.hr: Porazite protivnika prije nego što vrijeme istekne u nogometnoj utakmici s glavom odabirom svog lika.
short.hu: Győzd le az ellenfeledet, mielőtt lejár az idő a fejedben labdalabda focimeccsen, ha kiválasztod a karakteredet.
short.id: Kalahkan lawan Anda sebelum waktu habis dalam permainan sepak bola kepala dengan memilih karakter Anda.
short.it: Sconfiggi il tuo avversario prima che scada il tempo nel gioco di calcio della palla di testa scegliendo il tuo personaggio.
short.ja: あなたのキャラクターを選択して、ヘッドボールサッカーゲームで時間がなくなる前に相手を倒します。
short.kn: ನಿಮ್ಮ ಪಾತ್ರವನ್ನು ಆಯ್ಕೆ ಮಾಡುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಹೆಡ್ ಬಾಲ್ ಸಾಕರ್ ಆಟದಲ್ಲಿ ಸಮಯ ಮುಗಿಯುವ ಮೊದಲು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಎದುರಾಳಿಯನ್ನು ಸೋಲಿಸಿ.
short.ko: 당신의 캐릭터를 선택하여 헤드 볼 축구 게임에서 시간이 다 떨어지기 전에 상대를 물리 치십시오.
short.lv: Pieveiciet pretinieku, pirms laiks beidzas galvas bumbas futbola spēlē, izvēloties savu raksturu.
short.ml: ഹെഡ് ബോൾ സോക്കർ ഗെയിമിൽ നിങ്ങളുടെ സ്വഭാവം തിരഞ്ഞെടുത്ത് സമയം തീരുന്നതിനുമുമ്പ് നിങ്ങളുടെ എതിരാളിയെ പരാജയപ്പെടുത്തുക.
short.mr: हेड बॉल सॉकर गेममध्ये वेळ संपण्यापूर्वी आपल्या प्रतिस्पर्ध्याला पराभूत करा आणि आपले पात्र निवडून.
short.ms: Kekalahan lawan anda sebelum masa habis dalam permainan bola sepak bola kepala dengan memilih watak anda.
short.nl: Versla je tegenstander voordat de tijd om is in het hoofdbalvoetbalspel door je personage te kiezen.
short.no: Bekjemp motstanderen før tiden renner ut i fotballkampen ved å velge karakter.
short.pl: Pokonaj przeciwnika, zanim skończy się czas w grze w piłkę nożną, wybierając swoją postać.
short.ro: Învinge adversarul înainte de expirarea timpului în cap mingea joc de fotbal prin alegerea personajul tău.
short.ru: Победите противника до того, как истечет время в футбольной игре с мячом, выбрав своего персонажа.
short.sk: Porazte svojho súpera skôr, ako vyprší čas vo futbalovom zápase s hlavovou loptou výberom svojej postavy.
short.sl: Premagati nasprotnika, preden čas zmanjka v glavi žogo nogomet igro z izbiro vašega lika.
short.sv: Besegra din motståndare innan tiden tar slut i huvudbollsfotbollsspelet genom att välja din karaktär.
short.sw: Mshinde mpinzani wako kabla ya muda kuisha kwenye mchezo wa soka la mpira wa kichwa kwa kuchagua tabia yako.
short.ta: நேரம் உங்கள் பாத்திரம் தேர்ந்தெடுப்பதன் மூலம் தலை பந்து கால்பந்து விளையாட்டு வெளியே இயங்கும் முன் உங்கள் எதிரி தோற்கடிக்க.
short.te: మీ పాత్రను ఎంచుకోవడం ద్వారా హెడ్ బాల్ సాకర్ గేమ్ లో సమయం ముగియడానికి ముందు మీ ప్రత్యర్థిని ఓడించండి.
short.th: เอาชนะคู่ต่อสู้ของคุณก่อนที่เวลาจะหมดลงในเกมฟุตบอลเฮดบอลโดยเลือกตัวละครของคุณ
short.tr: Karakterinizi seçerek kafa topu futbol oyununda süre dolmadan rakibinizi yenin.
short.uk: Перемагайте суперника до того, як закінчиться час у футбольній грі з головним м'ячем, вибравши свого персонажа.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you like football games! Start your head ball game fun with 2 different modes and 6+ football players. Defeat all your opponents and show your skill in this soccer game with sweet graphics.

Head Soccer 2022 Sports Game is a game that conquers the hearts of football lovers as a football match simulator. With single and two-player modes, it offers an enjoyable experience for all players. Your goal is to clinch victory by scoring the most goals against your opponent or friend before time runs out. While the 2D graphics of the game offer a simple and attractive visuality to the players, it successfully reflects the football atmosphere of the game with its realistic sound effects. Twelve different character options open the doors to an exciting world that awaits you when you step onto the football fields.

The main goal in Head Soccer 2022 Sports Game is to win the match by scoring the most goals to the opponent's goal before the time runs out. Using your character skillfully to send the ball to the opponent's goal increases the tension and happiness, especially at the last minute. Each character has unique abilities and playstyle, so thinking strategically and making the right moves is the key to success in the game.

Head Soccer 2022 is also an ideal option for casual games. It appeals to a broad audience thanks to its simple and fun gameplay that can be easily understood by anyone interested in sports games and football fans. The simple control mechanism of the game allows you to adapt to the game quickly and enjoy football to the fullest.

One of the most essential features of the game is the two-player mode. You can get together with your friends to participate in unique football competitions and challenge each other. Matches for two provide moments of fun and competition. You can strengthen your friendship ties while playing with your closest friends while enjoying football.

Twelve characters in the game offer players a rich choice in terms of variety. You can write your football story by choosing characters representing different personalities, from famous football stars to legendary players. Each character's different abilities and traits further spice up your gaming experience.

The visual appeal of Head Soccer 2022 helps it successfully convey the football atmosphere. The football fields, decorated with colourful and vivid graphics, invite football fans to a magical world. The game's various field options bring the excitement of the world cup to the players and carry the passion of football to all geographies.

How To Play
Played with Z-X-Arrow Keys.

Head Soccer 2022 Sports Game Features
✓ 6+ Character
✓ 2 Different Mode
✓ Easy control
✓ 2D Graphics
✓ Little Particle

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Head Soccer 2022 Sports Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@pickergame.com and share your thoughts and problems.
